title: Throttle Position Sensor

body.body: The fixings for the throttle position sensor are marked with yellow paint and must not be loosened or removed.
If the fixings have been loosened or removed the throttle body assembly must be replaced as there are no means to reset the throttle position sensor to its correct position.

The fixings for the throttle position sensor are marked with yellow paint and must not be loosened or removed. If the fixings have been loosened or removed any warranty claims for the throttle bodies will be rejected.
The throttle position sensor can not be removed, replaced or adjusted in service. If necessary, the throttle bodies and throttle position sensor must be replaced as an assembly.
